name: Vile Barber
description: The Vile Barber is a small fey creature with high Dexterity, known for its chaotic nature and treacherous behavior. It wields a Straight Razor and utilizes stealth to strike its foes.
memorable: It has the unique ability Blood Frenzy, granting its attacks advantage against injured foes, and can inflict ongoing damage with its wounding attacks.
goals: To inflict harm and terror upon others while evading capture through stealth and trickery.
relations: Often encountered in areas where other fey are found, it may associate with other chaotic or evil creatures.
environment: Commonly found in dark, secluded places, often within forests or areas where it can hide easily.
strengths: Excels in stealth and mobility, resistant to nonmagical physical damage.
weaknesses: Low Constitution and Wisdom scores make it vulnerable to certain spells and effects.
attacks: Utilizes a Straight Razor to deal slashing damage or steal items, inflicting bleeding wounds that cause ongoing damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Blood Frenzy ability allows it to strike faster and more effectively against weakened enemies.
skills: Highly skilled in Stealth and Acrobatics, allowing for effective evasion and maneuverability.
additional_information: Can teleport to avoid attacks and hide.
Deals necrotic damage with its Frightening Cut ability.
